name: Fox Evolution - The Secret of The Mutant Foxes
name_original: Fox Evolution - The Secret of The Mutant Foxes
description:
The secret of the fox is an ancient mystery, but now you can crack it! Combine different species of these elusive creatures to create as many foxy mutations as you possibly can, and pay very close attention to them to finally answer a question that burns on human hearts since the dawn of time: what does the fox say?

After such an enlightening experience, you’ll never look at a fox the same way again. Maybe they are alien creatures, or angels in disguise: with so many crazy mutations, they might as well be (and say) anything!

FOXY FEATURES
• Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
• Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the foxes

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag and drop similar foxes to create new mysterious creatures
• Use fox eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
• Alternatively, fiercely tap a fox to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS
• Different stages and many fox species to discover
• A mind-blowing story with sly twists!
• The unexpected mix of creature evolution dynamics and incremental clicker games
• Doodle-like illustrations
• Various possible endings: find your destiny
• No foxes were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Isn’t this the best fox news you’ve read in ages?


Evolution NEVER ends. Check out some of the other games in the series:

Unicorn Evolution - http://bit.ly/UnicornEvo - Because horses MUST have horns!
Rabbit Evolution - http://bit.ly/RabbitEvo - Rabbits can surprise you!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
